name: final_fantasy
description: A large Final Fantasy-themed package of rules-text templates and ad-lib pools for the mtg_set_gen system. Includes Summons-like saga creatures, Job Select, Towns, Tiered spells, Jump, Darkness/Protect, Limit Breaks, Equipment and Materia hooks, and Sidequest-flavored effects. Designed to be thematically rich without requiring DFCs.
